meanings.definition: A type of alcoholic beverage made from the fermented sap of the toddy palm.
meanings.sent1: The villagers enjoyed sipping on bebeeru during their festive celebrations.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone was offered a glass of bebeeru to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The bebeeru flowed freely at the wedding, making everyone dance joyfully.
meanings.sent4: The golden hue of the bebeeru shimmered in the sunlight, enticing all to taste.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bebeeru filled the room, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: She decided to bebeeru with her friends at the beach party.
meanings.sent2: After a long day, he likes to relax and bebeeru in the evening.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to bebeeru the milk with great satisfaction.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the group gathered to bebeeru and share stories around the campfire.
meanings.sent5: The athletes would bebeeru energy drinks before their intense training sessions.
